unnormalised: ## Social Media & Influencer Marketing: Follower Analytics
normalised: ## Social Media and Influencer Marketing: Follower Analytics

unnormalised: Guess what, folks? Your Instagram game just got a whole lot smarter! Forget blindly posting those Diwali mithai pics and hoping for the best. New follower analytics tools are rolling out, giving you the inside scoop on who's actually seeing your content.
normalised: Guess what, folks? Your Instagram game just got a whole lot smarter! Forget blindly posting those Diwali mithai pics and hoping for the best. New follower analytics tools are rolling out, giving you the inside scoop on who is actually seeing your content.

unnormalised: Think of it as your personal chaiwala spilling all the juicy gossip!
normalised: Think of it as your personal chaiwala spilling all the juicy gossip!

unnormalised: Now, you can finally figure out if it's your aunty network from Delhi who are all-in, or if your foodie posts are killing it with the Bangalore crowd.
normalised: Now, you can finally figure out if it is your aunty network from Delhi who are all-in, or if your foodie posts are killing it with the Bangalore crowd.

unnormalised: These analytics dive deep - age, location (down to the Vile Parle pin code!), even interests!
normalised: These analytics dive deep - age, location (down to the Vile Parle pin code!), even interests!

unnormalised: Dr. Sharma from IIM-Ahmedabad says it's a game-changer for influencer marketing.
normalised: Doctor Sharma from I I M-Ahmedabad says it is a game-changer for influencer marketing.

unnormalised: No more wasting Rs. 50,000 on a sponsored post that reaches, like, 5 people!
normalised: No more wasting rupee fifty thousand on a sponsored post that reaches, like, five people!

unnormalised: Imagine targeting just the right audience, knowing exactly what they want. That new saree design you're promoting? Boom! Targeted ads hitting just the 25-35 age group interested in silk from Kanchipuram. Suddenly, that small 500 sq ft boutique of yours feels HUGE. It's time to get serious about those numbers, yaar!
normalised: Imagine targeting just the right audience, knowing exactly what they want. That new saree design you are promoting? Boom! Targeted ads hitting just the twenty five to thirty five age group interested in silk from Kanchipuram. Suddenly, that small five hundred square foot boutique of yours feels HUGE. It is time to get serious about those numbers, yaar!
